Responsibilities: Collaborate with Agile teams to design, develop, test, implement, and support technical solutions

Share passion for staying on top of tech trends, experimenting with new technologies, participating in internal and external technology communities, mentoring other members of the engineering community
Work with digital product managers and deliver robust cloud-based solutions that drive powerful experiences

Utilize programming languages like Java, Python, SQL, Node, Go, and Scala, Open Source RDBMS and NoSQL databases, Container Orchestration services including Docker and Kubernetes, and a variety of AWS tools and services
Requirements: At least 3 years of experience in software engineering
NiceToHaves: 2+ years of experience in Agile practices
1+ years of experience with AWS, GCP, Microsoft Azure, or another cloud service
4+ years of experience in at least one of the following: Java, Scala, Python, Go, Javascript/TypeScript, Angular/React.js, or Node.js
2+ years of experience working with big data technologies (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Presto)
2+ years of experience working on streaming data applications (e.g. Kafka, Kinesis, Flink, or Spark Streaming)
4+ years of experience in open source frameworks
Benefits: Comprehensive, competitive, and inclusive set of health, financial, and other benefits
Performance based incentive compensation (may include cash bonus(es) and/or long term incentives)
